name: attention
actor_no_arg: You cough loudly to get everyone's attention.
others_no_arg: $n coughs really LOUDLY! Maybe $e wants your ATTENTION.
actor_found_target: You cough loudly at $N to get $s attention.
others_found: $n coughs loudly at $N, $e must want $s attention.
target_found: $n coughs loudy at you. Maybe $e wants your ATTENTION!!!
